TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewLinkCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 表示包含链接的单元格。

span.span: Represents a cell that contains a link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是种特殊的类型的用来显示链接。The class is a specialized type of used to display links. 列类型专用于保存此类型的单元格。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下函数将初始化为一个新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在列内的单元格模式的现有后，设置该列的属性设置为要用作一种模式的单元格。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 列的单元格相关的属性都是相似的属性的模板单元格的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元格的属性值将只影响单元格基于模板在更改后添加。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 更改列的单元格相关属性值，但是，将更新模板单元格和列中的所有其他单元格，如有必要刷新列显示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用作为模板。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a template for a . 对列中的任何单元格所做的样式更改会影响所有列的单元格。Style changes made to any cell in the column affect all of the column's cells. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

span.para: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。此外应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 获取或设置用来显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.

value.span: ，表示用于显示选定的链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display a link that is being selected.

value.span: 默认值为用户的 Internet Explorer 中对链接处于悬停状态时的颜色设置。

span.span: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the color of links in the hover state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置所属列的属性还会设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

summary.span: 创建此单元格的精确副本。

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法时从派生并将新属性添加到派生的类。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

span.para: 重写时派生类中调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保也将复制的派生类中添加的任何属性的值。

When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前调用。 is called just before . 它必须返回`true`如果在调用的取消共享已包含该单元格的行的效果。It must return `true` if the call to has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell. 它应返回`false`否则为。It should return `false` otherwise. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior LinkBehavior { System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior value); };
member this.LinkBehavior : System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示链接的行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of a link.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 链接行为的示例包括该链接始终显示下划线或链接才显示下划线，当鼠标指针移到它，以及是否通过双击还是一次单击激活链接。Examples of link behavior include whether the link always displays an underline or the link only displays an underline when the mouse pointer moves over it, and whether a double click or a single click activates a link. 设置所属列的属性还会设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid value.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，则时访问链接后，自动设置属性。When the property is set to `true`, the property is automatically set when the link is visited. 如果已通过使用鼠标或键盘选择激活它，访问链接。A link is visited if it has been activated by selecting it with the mouse or keyboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前调用。 is called just before . 它必须返回`true`如果在调用的取消共享已包含该单元格的行的效果。It must return `true` if the call to has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell. 它应返回`false`否则为。It should return `false` otherwise. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示链接被访问后，其颜色是否改变。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link changes color when it is visited.

value.span: 如果在选中链接时，该链接更改颜色，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the link changes color when it is selected; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`false`，则属性将不会自动设置为`true`时访问。When `false`, the property will not be automatically set to `true` when visited. 设置所属列的属性还会设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示列 属性值是否显示为链接文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column property value is displayed as the link text.

value.span: 如果列的 属性值显示为链接文本，则为 ；如果单元格的 属性值显示为链接文本，则为 。

span.span: if the column property value is displayed as the link text; if the cell property value is displayed as the link text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置所属列的属性还会设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示以前访问过的链接的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display a link that has been previously visited.

value.span: ，表示用来显示已访问过的链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display a link that has been visited.

value.span: 默认值为用户的 Internet Explorer 中对已访问过的链接的颜色设置。

span.span: The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the visited link color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置所属列的属性还会设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#70)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#70)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#70](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#70)]
